name: Post Lists View Custom
author: gqevu6bsiz

sections.description:
• All Posts List View
  • All Page List View
  • Custom Post Type List View
  • Media Library List View
  • Comments List View
  • Available Widgets List View
  • Menus to show on screen
  • Menus to show advanced menu properties
  • Users List View

These list to customization is possible.

日本語でのご説明

  • 投稿一覧
  • ページ一覧
  • カスタム投稿タイプ一覧
  • メディア一覧
  • コメント一覧
  • 利用できるウィジェット一覧
  • メニューの表示一覧
  • メニューの拡張表示一覧

これらの一覧表示をカスタマイズするプラグインです。
アイキャッチ画像やカスタムフィールドの項目、記事のIDを一覧に表示することが可能です。
また、表示の順番も自由に変更できます。
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire post-list-view-custom folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find ‘Post Lists View Customize’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

What about foo bar?
sections.changelog:
1.7.4

  • Fixed: Show the only title column of the Posts list.

1.7.3

  • Updated: Adjustment of the CSS.
  • Updated: Column load way.
  • Updated: Possible to edit columns the Users.
  • Added: Some fields of Posts List.

1.7.2

  • Security enhancement: Escape to add_query_arg/remove_query_arg.

1.7.1

  • Fixed: Show the available widgets.
  • Updated: Optimize to load of Custom Fields.

1.7

  • Updated: Media Library support when list view with WP 4.0.
  • Added: Possible to sortable on List table customize.
  • Fixed: Text color showing on customizing.
  • Fixed: Javascript error when Add new columns with WP 4.0.
  • Fixed: Change the priority of some hooks.
  • Fixed: Change the show to custom posts and custom taxonomy that is displayed on the Menu.
  • Fixed: Setting the automatic width of the ID column.
  • Fixed: Sort the columns.
  • Fixed: Strengthening of Ajax check.

1.6.1

  • Updated: List table also apply to the width of Thumbnail.
  • Updated: Default width size is change of the Thumbnail.

1.6

  • Updated: Useful settings interface.
  • Updated: Improvement of working.
  • Added: Change user role of this plugin working.

1.5.9

  • Added: Automatic setting of the cell width of list table.
  • Updated: Non settings for unknown widgets.

1.5.8

  • Updated: Change the way of columns load.
  • Updated: Improvement in working performance.
  • Fixed: Hide column when deactive the other plugins.

1.5.7

  • Added: Edit of Culumns name.
  • Fixed: Mistake comment author of comments.

1.5.6.2

  • Fixed: Data settings way.

1.5.6.1

  • Fixed: Settings reset.

1.5.6

  • Updated: Suppoted WP3.8.
  • Updated: Change the Data store way.
  • Updated: Get change of custom field way.
  • Updated: Screen shots.

1.5.5.1

  • Added: Translation for Serbo-Croatian.
  • Updated: Translation for German.

1.5.5

  • Supported: Quick edit.
  • Updated: Translations.

1.5.4

  • Support on SSL.
  • Added to Custom Taxonomies on Menu.
  • Easy to set in color-coded.
  • Changed some settings method.
  • Column to hidden when plugins been deactivated.
  • Corresponds to the theme of MP6.

1.5.3.2

  • Added a confirmation of Nonce field.
  • Deleted old data conversion.
  • Checked Compatibility.

1.5.3.1

  • Bug fix : HTML escape mistake.

1.5.3

  • Added corresponding column of other plugins.

1.5.2

  • Added any translation files.
  • Change the get of user role.

1.5.1

  • Bug fix : Can not choose the custom field.

1.5

  • Changed the show when there is no value of the custom fields.
  • Changed a lot of processing.
  • To be able to choose the user role to be applied.
  • Changed to the data update method.
  • Added Available Widgets lists.

1.4.1

  • Changed the method of obtaining the thumbnail image.
  • Added menu to the thumbnail size setting.

1.4

Added to screen management for comments lists.
Added a translation file.
Changed the layout.

1.3.2

I fixed a mistake.

1.3.1

Added a plugin recommendations.

1.3

Added management for nav-menus.

1.2.1

I added that because there was no image display field.

1.2

be able to see the ID of the article.
Media list can be customized.

1.1

I also support and custom post type page.
Changed the position of the menu.

1.0.2

It is now possible to display a custom field image.
I reduced a little item from custom list field.

1.0.1

there is a bug in the display of the thumbnail in custom field.

1.0

This is the initial release.
